description:
Thicken and green up your grass

Sun & Shade Seed + Feed delivers your lawn fertilizer, grass seed, and soil conditioner in one application.

Give your tired lawn a pick-me-up with Sun & Shade Seed + Feed. Our premium combination lawn product offers 9-0-2 blend of fertilizer to sustained growth for up to 6 weeks, premium grass seeds help build dense turf to outcompete weeds, and nutrient-rich soil conditioners to help build healthier soils.

Sunday formulates pesticide-free fertilizer solutions to help you grow a better lawn without harsh chemicals.

sections.product_benefits:
9-0-2 NPK (Nitrogen-Phosphorus-Potassium) 3 in 1 combination product
Thickens and greens up lawns for 6 weeks
Improves lawn tolerance to drought and traffic
Made for lawns in northern and transitional zones
Ideal for full sun to shady cool-season lawns
Zero pesticides
Apply in 20 minutes or less
Results in 8-21 days
sections.ingredients:
Nitrogen: for growth and greening
Potassium: for improved stress tolerance
Grass seed: Tall fescue and fine fescue seed blend for full sun to shady lawns
Soil Conditioners: limestone, gypsum, and dried poultry waste to improve soil health
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply early in the morning or evening and ensure your lawn is adequately hydrated. Avoid use on drought-affected or heat-stressed lawns.
Prep your lawn by mowing and removing all grass clippings from your lawn.
Apply using a hand or broadcast spreader at a rate of 20 lbs/3,000 sq. ft. For best results, follow the application rates on the package and apply uniformly across your entire lawn.
Keep the soil moist but not saturated until new grass reaches about 2 inches in height, and then return to normal watering.
Reapply every 6 weeks during the growing season, up to four times per year.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
When is the best time to apply Sun & Shade Seed + Feed?
Apply in spring or fall when daily average temperatures range between 60-75 degrees F. If you apply too early or late, cold snaps or unexpected freezes can hinder seed germination.
How long will it take to germinate or see results?
You should begin to see deeper greening and germination in 8-21 days, so long as the product is applied correctly and watered properly.
Can I use this with other Sunday fertilizer products?
We don't recommend utilizing both Seed + Feed with other Sunday fertilizers at the same time. Wait 4-6 weeks between the applications of Sun & Shade Seed + Feed and Sunday fertilizers.
Do I have to wait before using my lawn again?
Pets and humans can use areas as soon as products are watered in.
Are there any US states where this product is not approved for use?
Sun & Shade Seed + Feed is approved for use and distribution in all states. Special registrations for CA, FL, and PA.
